name: Border Mountain
description:
"Border Mountain" is the first work developed by Hercules Game Studio. The game adopts classic role-playing and turn-based combat mechanics. Defeat enemies along the journey and uncover the truth of the world!

Classic turn-based combat: Experience different combat strategies with various classes and skills. Each battle is different based on your decisions!

Explore the unknown world: Set off from the foot of the mountain, venture into dangerous wilderness and mountain cave mazes, and unravel the traps laid by enemies!

Experience the traditional storyline: Delve into the shadows of the mountains, uncover the truth of the story, and defeat powerful bosses!

Grow with the protagonists: Face different enemies and challenges with the protagonist team during the adventure, and grow together with them!
